traits.name: Fortune Favour
traits.effect: Favoured by Luck - more likely to receive unexpected gains.

skills.name: On a Warm Afternoon
skills.description: Deals Lumino Damage to enemies in front and reduces their Movement Speed. When [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, using this skill relocates the field to user's position, expands its range to match [Boisterous Tea Party], and increases its damage.

skills.name: Let the Tea Party Begin!
skills.description: Creates a [Boisterous Tea Party] field in front of Fina.[Boisterous Tea Party] continously consumes Sanity and ends when Sanity drops to 0 or when this skill is held. During [Boisterous Tea Party], using the skill again will switch the field effects in order of the [Tea Party Guests] - [Nightingale], [Hound], [Unicorn], and [Butterfly]. Using the skill again outside the range of [Boisterous Tea Party] will relocate it to Fina's current location. [Boisterous Tea Party] : Generates an elemental field that corresponds to the element type of the [Tea Party Guests], with [Nightingale] for Hydro, [Hound] for Pyro, [Unicorn] for Electro, [Butterfly] for Anemo. When the field appears or its element shifts, Fina and allies gain bonus elemental damage matching the field type.While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, the field deals elemental damage to enemies within range every 2 seconds.

skills.name: Bad Sorcerers Hate Sunlight!
skills.description: Grants bonus Lumino Damage that lasts throughout the battle. Each time ["On a Warm Afternoon"] is used, grants 6 stacks of [Taleweaver Quill]. While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, generates 1 stack of [Taleweaver Quill] per second, up to 30 stacks. [Taleweaver Quill] : Deals additional Lumino Damage
